\begin{equation}
S=Z=\int DX D \psi~{\rm exp} [ -I_0(X,\psi) ]
~{\rm Tr \, P \, exp} \int^{\pi}_{-\pi}d\tau M(\tau),
\

\begin{equation}
\label{masscompare}
\begin{array}{cl}
M_{D0+\overline{D0}}\leq M_{ND1}\leq M_{D2+\overline{D2}}~~
&~~(\mbox{when}~\frac{1}{R_1^2}+\frac{1}{R_2^2}\leq 1),\\
&\\
M_{D0+\overline{D0}}\leq M_{D2+\overline{D2}}\leq M_{ND1}~~
&~~(\mbox{when}~\frac{1}{R_1^2}+\frac{1}{R_2^2}\geq 1~~\mbox{and}~~
R_1R_2\geq 2),
\\ 
&\\
M_{D2+\overline{D2}}\leq M_{D0+\overline{D0}}\leq M_{ND1}~~
&~~(\mbox{when}~R_1R_2\leq 2~~\mbox{and}~~R_1^2+R_2^2\geq 4),\\
&\\
M_{D2+\overline{D2}}\leq M_{ND1}\leq M_{D0+\overline{D0}}~~
&~~(\mbox{when}~R_1^2+R_2^2\leq 4).
\end{array}
